Bos Apple Klaim Penjualan iPhone 11 Kinclong, Ini Sebabnya
02 Nov 2019, 23:34 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


iPhone 11. Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

Jakarta - CEO Apple, Tim Cook, sedang bergembira. Perusahaannya baru saja membukukan performa keuangan yang solid dan penjualan iPhone 11 juga menggembirakan.Pada kuartal IV 2019, Apple memperoleh pendapatan USD 64 miliar dengan keuntungan USD 13,69 miliar. Pertumbuhan bisnis layanan, wearable dan iPad turut menyokong besarnya revenue tersebut.Di sisi lain, Cook menyebut penjualan iPhone 11 dimulai dengan sangat baik, termasuk membantu membangkitkan penjualan di China. Faktor harga lebih murah rupanya berpengaruh besar."Harga mulai USD 699 adalah faktor yang membawa lebih banyak orang ke pasar iPhone dan menjadi alasan lain untuk upgrade," kata suksesor Steve Jobs tersebut, dikutip detikINET dari Reuters.Banderol iPhone 11 sebesar USD 699 memang lebih rendah daripada harga permulaan iPhone XR tahun silam yang senilai USD 749.Analis pun mengamini lebih murahnya harga mengatrol penjualan iPhone, terkhusus di China. "Strategi baru Apple dengan harga rendah memiliki imbas yang sangat besar," cetus James Yan dari Counterpoint Research.Sayangnya, hal itu mungkin tak bertahan lama karena agresivitas vendor lokal. Seiring sudah digelarnya jaringan 5G, pabrikan semacam Xiaomi dan Huawei siap-siap meluncurkan beragam ponsel yang mendukungnya.Adapun Apple baru akan memperkenalkan iPhone 5G pada tahun depan. Bisa jadi hal itu akan membuat konsumen kembali banyak yang berpaling. Simak Video "Luncurkan Seri Baru, Harga Jual iPhone Lama Turun Sampai 30%"[Gambas:Video 20detik](agt/afr)

Apple boss claims sales of sleek iPhone 11, this is the reason
02 Nov 2019, 23:34 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


iPhone 11. Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

Jakarta - Apple's CEO, Tim Cook, is having fun. His company has just posted a solid financial performance and sales of the iPhone 11 are also encouraging. In the fourth quarter of 2019, Apple earned revenue of USD 64 billion with a profit of USD 13.69 billion. The growth of the service, wearable and iPad business also contributed to the huge revenue. On the other hand, Cook said sales of the iPhone 11 began very well, including helping to generate sales in China. The lower price factor seems to have a big effect. "Prices starting at USD 699 are factors that bring more people to the iPhone market and become another reason for upgrading," said successor Steve Jobs, quoted from Reuters. lower than the initial price of the iPhone XR last year which was valued at USD 749. Analysts also agreed that the price of lower-selling iPhone sales, especially in China. "Apple's new low-price strategy has a huge impact," said James Yan of Counterpoint Research. Unfortunately, it might not last long because of the aggressiveness of local vendors. As the 5G network has been deployed, manufacturers such as Xiaomi and Huawei are getting ready to launch a variety of phones that support it. As for Apple, Apple will introduce the new iPhone 5G next year. It could be that it will make many consumers turn back.
